mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ACCOUNTDESC WHERE email_id=#{emailId} and friend_id= #{friendId}
SELECT mem.first_name_s,mem.last_name_s,ad.self_flag,ad.friends_flag,ad.friend_id FROM ACCOUNTDESC ad,members mem WHERE mem.email_id=ad.friend_id and ad.email_id=#{emailId};
SELECT mem.first_name_s,mem.last_name_s,ad.friend_id FROM ACCOUNTDESC ad,members mem WHERE mem.email_id=ad.friend_id and ad.email_id=#{emailId} and ad.self_flag=1 and ad.friends_flag=1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNTDESC ( email_id , friend_id, group_id, document_id , forum_id, self_flag, friends_flag) VALUES (#{emailId}, #{friendId}, #{groupId} ,#{documentId}, #{forumId}, #{selfFlag} ,#{friendsFlag} );
mapper.delete: DELETE from ACCOUNTDESC WHERE email_id = #{emailId} and friend_id= #{friendId};
